<a id="RDShaderSource"></a>

# RDShaderSource

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Shader source code (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Shader source code in text form.

See also [RDShaderFile](RDShaderFile.md). **RDShaderSource** is only meant to be used with the [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md) API. It should not be confused with Redot's own [Shader](Shader.md) resource, which is what Redot's various nodes use for high-level shader programming.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RDShaderSource_method_get_stage_source"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_stage_source**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSource_method_get_stage_source)

Returns source code for the specified shader `stage`. Equivalent to getting one of [source_compute](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_compute), [source_fragment](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_fragment), [source_tesselation_control](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_tesselation_control), [source_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_tesselation_evaluation) or [source_vertex](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_vertex).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDShaderSource_method_set_stage_source"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_stage_source**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage), source\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSource_method_set_stage_source)

Sets `source` code for the specified shader `stage`. Equivalent to setting one of [source_compute](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_compute), [source_fragment](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_fragment), [source_tesselation_control](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_tesselation_control), [source_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_tesselation_evaluation) or [source_vertex](RDShaderSource.md#RDShaderSource_property_source_vertex).

\ **Note:** If you set the compute shader source code using this method directly, remember to remove the Redot-specific hint ``#[compute]``.
